changeSet.author: Pritam
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for covid 19 assessment form

changeSet.author: Bindu, Pritam
changeSet.comment: Adding codes to specific concepts

changeSet.author: Bindu, Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Initial', 'Discharge') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CV, Type of Assessment");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to CV, Type of Assessment

changeSet.author: Bindu, Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Suspect', 'Confirmed','Probable','Not a Case') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CV, COVID-19 Case");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('CV, Date of PCR Test','CV, Type of Specimen','CV, Other Specimen Type','CV, PCR Test Results','CV, Other COVID-19 Test Done','CV, Date of Other COVID-19 Test') AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'CV, COVID-19 Testing');

changeSet.comment: Adding set members for "CV, COVID-19 Testing" Concept

changeSet.author: Pritam, Bindu

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('CV, Weight','CV, Height','CV, Temp','CV, RR','CV, SpO2 on room air','CV, SpO2 on Oxygen','CV, How Many Liters of Oxygen Per Min?','CV, Heart Rate','CV, Systolic BP','CV, Diastolic BP','CV, Pain') AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'CV, Patient Vitals at Arrival');

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("CV, COVID-19 Case", "CV, COVID-19 Testing", "CV, Mode of Arrival", "CV, Referral From", "CV, Other Mode of Arrival", "CV, Contact with a Confirmed COVID-19 Case in Last 14 Days?", "CV, Has Patient Traveled in the Past 14 Days?", "CV, Traveled to Which Country", "CV, Date of Return from Travel", "CV, Has Patient Been in a Healthcare Facility in the Last 14 Days?", "CV, Name of the Healthcare Facility", "CV, In or Outpatient Care in the Healthcare Facility?", "CV, Is Patient a Healthcare Worker?", "CV, Patient Vitals at Arrival", "CV, Signs and Symptoms at Admission", "CV, Other Signs and Symptoms", "CV, Days Since Onset of First Symptoms", "CV, History of Present Illness", "CV, Is the Patient a Woman of Reproductive Age Group (15 - 51)?", "CV, Pregnant", "CV, Gestational Age", "CV, Breastfeeding", "CV, Post-Partum (less than 6 Weeks)", "CV, Current/Recent COVID-19 Medications (Past 14 Days)", "CV, Other Current/Recent Medications", "CV, Medication Allergies", "CV, Smoking History", "CV, Co-Morbidities", "CV, Other Co-Morbidities", "CV, Past Complimentary Medical History", "CV, Physical Examination", "CV, COVID-19 Severity", "CV, Initial Lab and Radiology Examinations", "CV, Disposition Section") AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'CV, Initial Assessment');

changeSet.comment: Adding set members for CV, Initial Assessment

changeSet.author: Pritam, Bindu

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("CV, Date of COVID-19 Test", "CV, Type of COVID-19 Test", "CV, Type of Specimen", "CV, COVID-19 Test Results") AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'CV, Laboratory Tests During Hospitalization');

changeSet.comment: Adding set members for "CV, Laboratory Tests During Hospitalization" Concept

changeSet.author: Bindu, Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("CV, Complications", "CV, Other Complications", "CV, ICU Complications", "CV, Other ICU Complications", "CV, COVID-19 Persistent Symptoms at Discharge", "CV, Other Symptoms at Discharge", "CV, Newly Introduced Treatment During Hospitalization", "CV, Antibiotics", "CV, Corticosteroid", "CV, Other Newly Introduced Treatment During Hospitalization", "CV, Treatment Adverse Events", "CV, ICU During Hospitalization?", "CV, ICU Respiratory Support", "CV, Number of Days Under Invasive Mechanical Ventilation", "CV, Number of Days Under Non Invasive Mechanical Ventilation", "CV, Number of Days in ICU", "CV, Procedures During ICU Stay", "CV, Other Procedures During ICU Stay", "CV, If Pregnant", "CV, Laboratory Tests During Hospitalization", "CV, Discharge Treatment Plan", "CV, Newly Introduced Treatment to Be Continued at Home", "CV, Treatment of Pre-Existing/Chronic Conditions to Be Continued", "CV, Clinical Follow-Up Requirements", "CV, Hospital Discharge Status", "CV, Referral to Another Hospital", "CV, Death", "CV, Was the Death in the ICU?", "CV, ICU Death", "CV, Cause of Death", "CV, Other Cause of Death", "CV, Discharge Date and Time") AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'CV, Discharge Assessment');

changeSet.comment: Adding set members for CV, Initial Assessment

changeSet.author: Pritam, Bindu

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("CV, Date Recorded", "CV, Type of Assessment", "CV, Initial Assessment", "CV, Discharge Assessment") AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'CV, COVID-19 Assessment');

changeSet.comment: Adding set members for "CV, COVID-19 Assessment" Concept

changeSet.author: Pritam, Bindu

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name ='CV, COVID-19 Assessment' AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All Observation Templates');

changeSet.comment: Adding set members for to all observation templates
